p:
For the crop yields of irrigated or rain-fed areas, we used the mean yields from 1990 to 2004 calculated with the Lund-Potsdam-Jena managed Land Dynamic Global Vegetation and Water Balance Model (LPJmL)
28 . The mean yield is weighted by this yield information. All crop yields considered CO 2 fertilisation. The yields of 13 crops from the LPJmL were aggregated into seven crop classifications in the model in each grid using the crop production of the country in which the grid was situated
24 as the weight.
